ProductInfo.Features:
PIPO M9 10.1 inch IPS screen Android 4.2 Rockchip RK3188 Quad-core Tablet PC 2GB RAM DDR3 & 16GB memory and quad-core processor for best performance, OS has updated to Android 4.2
Bluetooth for data transferring and 5MP back camera with flashlight, 10-point capacitive touch screen for convenient operation
Built-in 3D graphics acceleration and playback 720P & 1080P HD video, Supports external 3G USB dongle and HDMI port for HD video output
Supports APK format applications & game, such as Play Store, Gmail, Built-in TF/ Micro SD card slot and reads max 32GB TF memory card
Built-in rechargeable lithium battery, 7800mAh. Screen protector has already pasted on the screen for you
ProductInfo.Name: PIPO M9 10.1" IPS Screen Android 4.2 16GB RK3188 Quad-core Tablet PC w/ WiFi HDMI CPU 1.8GHz RAM 2GB
